# 1949 Holy Cross Crusaders football team

The 1949 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1949 college football season.  In its second year under head coach Bill Osmanski, the team compiled a 1â€“9 record. The team played its home games at Fitton Field in Worcester, Massachusetts.
